name: MEC Toaster Booties - Infants to Children
categories: Toddler and child slippers and booties
description:
Warm feet all winter as they ride in the stroller, sled, baby carrier or just toddle around the house. They have a large opening, high cut for good coverage, skid-proof polyurethane soles, and tough weather-resistant shells.Shell is 2-layer waterproof-breathable nylon (not fully taped) it offers excellent abrasion resistance, and protection from wind, rain and snow.Generous opening secures with 2 straps with hook and loop closures. One goes around the leg, the other keeps the bootie on a wriggling foot.Hyperloft insulation is warm, light and compacts easily.Rand is water-resistant coated nylon packcloth.Midsole is 5mm EVA foam.Footbed is soft and cozy polyester fleece.Sole is tough, skid-proof polyurethane.Sizing: Small fits approximately child size 4-6; Medium fits child size 7-9; Large fits child size 10-11; XL fits child size 12 to youth size 1.

        Sustainability
